name: 葉賜旭
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：VisSim介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、系統判別、控制器設計。
schedule:
1	Introduction	
2        Mathematical Foundation	
3        Mathematical Foundation
4	Modeling of Physical Systems	
5	Modeling of Physical Systems	
6	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	
7	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	
8	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	
9	期中考
10	Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems 	
11	Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems 	
12	Stability of Linear Control Systems	
13	Root-Locus Technique	
14	Root-Locus Technique	
15	Experiment 
16	Experiment 
17	Experiment 
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考：35%
期末考：35%
小考：30%
materials: Automatic Control Systems, B. C. Kuo and F. Golnaraghi, WILEY, 8th ed.
